subject: Data
title: Structured vs. Unstructured Data
description: A quick, practical guide to Structured vs. Unstructured Data.

hook.text: A bank transaction fits neatly in a spreadsheet row. A customer service phone call does not.

buildup.text: Structured data lives in tables â€” names, dates, amounts. Machines read it easily.

discovery.text: Unstructured data is everything else: emails, videos, images, social posts, voice recordings.

twist.text: Over 80% of the world's data is unstructured â€” and until recently, most of it was unusable.

climax.text: AI and machine learning finally made unstructured data searchable, classifiable, and valuable.

punchline.text: The messiest data turned out to be the most valuable.

quiz.question: What percentage of the world's data is unstructured?
